variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a structural change in the protein, affecting its function.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293T cell line expressing wild-type and mutated TP53.

Readout description.Result Description: Protein expression was reduced by 30% for the variant NM_000546.5:c.809C>T (p.R269W) compared to wild-type.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type TP53 cDNA was used as a positive control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: T-test was used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than or equal to 80% compared to wild-type.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 80% compared to wild-type.
